files.description: Package initializer for the outputs scaffold generator utilities.

Implements the end-to-end generator that creates /outputs and populates REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE.md, METADATA_SCHEMA.* plus ensures RIGHTS_AND_LICENSING_CHECKLIST.md and RIGHTS_LOG.csv exist and are cross-referenced.
Contains embedded default template contents for all scaffolded artifacts to guarantee deterministic generation without external dependencies.
Provides a runnable CLI entry point to initialize or validate the outputs scaffold and report what was created or updated.
Defines the Python project configuration including an installable console script for running the outputs scaffold generator.
Documents the purpose of the /outputs directory, expected artifacts, and references to rights and licensing tracking files.
Provides the initial standardized report outline scaffold to guide report drafting and ensure consistent sections and citations.
Provides a reusable case study template with prompts for context, evidence, methodology, outcomes, limitations, and rights notes.
Defines the canonical metadata schema for outputs artifacts in JSON Schema format including required fields and rights linkage.
Checklist for verifying permissions, attribution, and licensing requirements for any third-party assets referenced in outputs.
CSV template log to track rights, attribution, source URLs, license terms, and approval status for assets used in outputs.

missionDescription: Run/init an outputs scaffold generator (or manually create /outputs) and populate initial artifacts: REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE.md, METADATA_SCHEMA.*, and ensure RIGHTS_AND_LICENSING_CHECKLIST.md + RIGHTS_LOG.csv are present and referenced.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
